title: 118. Veteran Rules For Young Entrepreneurs
itunes:title: 118. Veteran Rules For Young Entrepreneurs
description:
Are you a young entrepreneur making silly rookie mistakes? On today's episode, Andy talks about the most common mistakes young entrepreneurs make, how you can avoid these mistakes, build your personal brand and turn your business into an indestructible empire.

LINKS MENTIONED IN THIS EPISODE:

  • Book Andy to Be on Your Podcast
  • Follow Andy on Instagram
  • Follow Andy on Facebook
  • Take complete control of your life - 75 HARD
  • Get my raw & uncensored advice about success & life delivered to you daily!
